reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Mobilising young women and men to become leaders in promoting environmental justice and sustainable living practices
Nuorista ymparistooikeudenmukaisuuden ja kestavan elamantavan suunnannayttajia

description.narrative: This project will equip and empower youth women leaders community leaders CBOs and CSOs to promote sustainable living practices by: a) increasing understanding knowledge and skills to enable participants to lead transformational processes in communities; b) providing financial and technical resources to community leaders to implement activities to raise awareness and foster sustainable living practices; c) supporting networks of individuals CBOs and CSOs to collect manage and analyse data for advocacy at local national and international levels. This will lead to transformation of participants at the personal level of communities at the relational level and within Myanmar at the social level. The need arises from Myanmar?s vulnerability to climate change co mpounded by the economic model promoted by the government which pursues industrialised agricultural policies over the interests of smallholders. Deforestation and environmental degradation are significant challenges in remote rural areas primarily inhabite d by minority ethnic groups. Myanmar?s top-down patriarchal power dynamics exclude women youth and other marginalised groups from participating in decision making processes.The project?s results will be:1. Women and youth leaders are equipped and empowered to respond to community needs regarding sustainable living.2. Community-level initiatives related to sustainable living are implemented.3. Advocacy on issues related to sustainable living raise awareness of climate change and women?s rights issues at loca l national and international levels.This project will benefit 90 women leaders 75 young leaders 75 local CSO/CBO members and communities across Myanmar (165000 people).The project is implemented by Gaia Organization accompanied by Caritas Finland and CAFOD .

tag.narrative: Improving democracy in societies is the main priority area in this activity
Improving food security, access to water and sustainability is the secondary priority area in t his activity
Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is a secondary priority area in this activity
